tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
    candidate_id INT,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    candidate_ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    candidate_gender VARCHAR(10),
    candidate_skills TEXT,
    candidate_experience INT,
    candidate_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data ( 
    recruitment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    job_title VARCHAR(255), 
    candidate_name VARCHAR(255), 
    candidate_ethnicity VARCHAR(255), 
    application_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics ( 
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    recruitment_id INT, 
    total_candidates INT, 
    diverse_candidates INT, 
    diversity_percentage FLOAT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (recruitment_id) REFERENCES recruitment_data(recruitment_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    candidate_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    candidate_phone VARCHAR(20),
    candidate_gender VARCHAR(10),
    candidate_ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    job_description TEXT,
    job_location VARCHAR(100),
    job_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
    job_id INT NOT NULL,
    application_status VARCHAR(20),
    application_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (job_id) REFERENCES job_openings(job_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    candidate_name VARCHAR(255),
    candidate_gender VARCHAR(10),
    candidate_ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    application_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    salary_range VARCHAR(50),
    open_positions INT
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_job_title VARCHAR(255),
    work_experience_years INT,
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    skills VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    candidate_gender VARCHAR(10),
    candidate_ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    diversity_index FLOAT,
    diversity_rank INT
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    job_description TEXT,
    job_location VARCHAR(100),
    salary_range DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(100),
    candidate_email VARCHAR(255),
    candidate_phone VARCHAR(15),
    candidate_resume TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE candidate_qualifications (
    qualification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    qualification_title VARCHAR(100),
    qualification_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidate_profiles(candidate_id)
)

CREATE TABLE diversity_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_id INT,
    candidate_id INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (job_id) REFERENCES job_openings(job_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidate_profiles(candidate_id)
)

CREATE TABLE interview_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_id INT,
    candidate_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    interview_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (job_id) REFERENCES job_openings(job_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidate_profiles(candidate_id)
)
